resources.string: "Not all paths between left and right are equal. The computer predictably goes down its fastest path. What is yours? Seize it first!"
"Use the teleporter. It's the only way. The turn counter will guide you from there."
"Oh no! The computer has built its path before you even had a chance to start!"
"This time the computer has a revert and inside information about your path. How can you level the playing field?"
